event.title: Lightning Talks & Social
event.description:
Lightning talks followed by a few beers at the nearest watering hole.

Everybody welcome! The group is very open and friendly. Come and chat tech with like minded people, listen to some interesting talks and enjoy some friendly drinks.

The event will be held at Potato's offices in central Bristol. They can only accommodate 40 people, so please sign up soon to avoid disappointment.

For those interested in giving a 5 minute lightning talk, please add your name and subject matter to the Google sheet here:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1foOcN44FiPnsKGZNS1hK5s4QIuw14ehHEP1Apc33dPY/edit?usp=sharing

I look forward to seeing you all there!
